name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D Debut】Watch the way I move~ #3DemonDebut #holoadvent [2Nob6f5dy7c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: A 3D drama performance featuring Nerissa Ravencroft, Houshou Marine, and Mori Calliope.

subtitles.original: はあ！？
subtitles.english: Hah!?

subtitles.original: I'm a sexy captain! Pirate captain! Hmph.
subtitles.english: I'm a sexy captain! Pirate captain! Hmph.

subtitles.original: Yes, well. Moving on...
subtitles.english: Yes, well. Moving on...

subtitles.original: I've brought you here to exact my revenge on you, Captain...
subtitles.english: I've brought you here to exact my revenge on you, Captain...

subtitles.original: ...for the untimely death of your lover.
subtitles.english: ...for the untimely death of your lover.

subtitles.original: I know that you were the one to take her life...
subtitles.english: I know that you were the one to take her life...

subtitles.original: ...and I will not stand for it! You will suffer by my hands!
subtitles.english: ...and I will not stand for it! You will suffer by my hands!

subtitles.original: はあ！？ちょっと待って...
subtitles.english: Hah!? Wait a minute...

subtitles.original: You know, this quest was just a distraction. It was meant to keep you from watching over your...
subtitles.english: You know, this quest was just a distraction. It was meant to keep you from watching over your...

subtitles.original: ...beautiful and sexy lover. And leave room for me to take your place.
subtitles.english: ...beautiful and sexy lover. And leave room for me to take your place.

subtitles.original: But now your lover is dead, and I am left with a hole in my heart.
subtitles.english: But now your lover is dead, and I am left with a hole in my heart.

subtitles.original: You will pay for what you've done here and now!
subtitles.english: You will pay for what you've done here and now!

subtitles.original: That's enough of that!
subtitles.english: That's enough of that!

subtitles.original: Death? What are you doing here? Don't you usually work the graveyard shift?
subtitles.english: Death? What are you doing here? Don't you usually work the graveyard shift?

subtitles.original: Unless you're planning on bringing back my beautiful little bird to me,
subtitles.english: Unless you're planning on bringing back my beautiful little bird to me,

subtitles.original: you can turn right around and poof yourself back to wherever it is you came from.
subtitles.english: you can turn right around and poof yourself back to wherever it is you came from.

subtitles.original: Well, maybe you don't know me as well as you pretend to.
subtitles.english: Well, maybe you don't know me as well as you pretend to.

subtitles.original: Or the pirate captain, as well as you think either.
subtitles.english: Or the pirate captain, as well as you think either.

subtitles.original: Look, you can go ahead and smite that human if you like.
subtitles.english: Look, you can go ahead and smite that human if you like.

subtitles.original: I'm not going to try and stop you.
subtitles.english: I'm not going to try and stop you.

subtitles.original: But I really think you might regret doing that.
subtitles.english: But I really think you might regret doing that.

subtitles.original: You would take the side of someone so cruel
subtitles.english: You would take the side of someone so cruel

subtitles.original: that they would take the life of their own lover?
subtitles.english: that they would take the life of their own lover?

subtitles.original: I expected better of you!
subtitles.english: I expected better of you!

subtitles.original: Besides, how am I supposed to take their place
subtitles.english: Besides, how am I supposed to take their place

subtitles.original: and make that beautiful cream puff my wife if this fool here has killed her?
subtitles.english: and make that beautiful cream puff my wife if this fool here has killed her?

subtitles.original: Wait, what? You want the Captain!?
subtitles.english: Wait, what? You want the Captain!?

subtitles.original: No! Where did you even get that from?
subtitles.english: No! Where did you even get that from?

subtitles.original: Why would you even think that I would want someone as old and badly dressed as you?
subtitles.english: Why would you even think that I would want someone as old and badly dressed as you?

subtitles.original: でもでも……
subtitles.english: But, but...

subtitles.original: No, it has always been that treasure box of wonder.
subtitles.english: No, it has always been that treasure box of wonder.

subtitles.original: That twin-tail talent.
subtitles.english: That twin-tail talent.

subtitles.original: That sweet girl who can do no sin,
subtitles.english: That sweet girl who can do no sin,

subtitles.original: that you kept back on land!
subtitles.english: that you kept back on land!

subtitles.original: That is the one I have wanted!
subtitles.english: That is the one I have wanted!

subtitles.original: You? No, not at all.
subtitles.english: You? No, not at all.

subtitles.original: Yeah, but you just called that treasure box of wonder a hag not too minutes ago.
subtitles.english: Yeah, but you just called that treasure box of wonder a hag not too minutes ago.

subtitles.original: What are you even talking about?
subtitles.english: What are you even talking about?

subtitles.original: I called this wrinkly old wreck here in front of me a hag, not my beautiful bride-to-be!
subtitles.english: I called this wrinkly old wreck here in front of me a hag, not my beautiful bride-to-be!

subtitles.original: Oh man, this is rich. You really have no idea, do you, Nerissa?
subtitles.english: Oh man, this is rich. You really have no idea, do you, Nerissa?

subtitles.original: Why are you laughing!?
subtitles.english: Why are you laughing!?

subtitles.original: I am not old! I am 17!
subtitles.english: I am not old! I am 17!

subtitles.original: Let me see if I can help you here. Maybe all the beauty is being hidden by...
subtitles.english: Let me see if I can help you here. Maybe all the beauty is being hidden by...

subtitles.original: ...this!
subtitles.english: ...this!

subtitles.original: I am not the pirate captain!
subtitles.english: I am not the pirate captain!

subtitles.original: No, she is actually his much more beautiful lover, who you claim to love.
subtitles.english: No, she is actually his much more beautiful lover, who you claim to love.

subtitles.original: That's right, here is the Marine you thought was lost.
subtitles.english: That's right, here is the Marine you thought was lost.

subtitles.original: That's not possible! I would have known! Or... I would never have...
subtitles.english: That's not possible! I would have known! Or... I would never have...

subtitles.original: I have a lot to say, but my most pressing question is:
subtitles.english: I have a lot to say, but my most pressing question is:

subtitles.original: How on earth did you not know?
subtitles.english: How on earth did you not know?

subtitles.original: You know, that's fair, because they look nothing alike.
subtitles.english: You know, that's fair, because they look nothing alike.

subtitles.original: But how was I supposed to know?
subtitles.english: But how was I supposed to know?

subtitles.original: How did such a simple mustache make her look so decidedly unattractive?
subtitles.english: How did such a simple mustache make her look so decidedly unattractive?

subtitles.original: It's just a mustache!
subtitles.english: It's just a mustache!

subtitles.original: I'm still cute!
subtitles.english: I'm still cute!

subtitles.original: Of course you are, dear. She's just an imbecile.
subtitles.english: Of course you are, dear. She's just an imbecile.

subtitles.original: Wait, why am I still mean?
subtitles.english: Wait, why am I still mean?

subtitles.original: Let me change that. Um, anyway...
subtitles.english: Let me change that. Um, anyway...

subtitles.original: But my dear, her stupidity can't protect you now that you've broken our deal.
subtitles.english: But my dear, her stupidity can't protect you now that you've broken our deal.

subtitles.original: A broken deal with Death means that your soul is mine!
subtitles.english: A broken deal with Death means that your soul is mine!

subtitles.original: This is all your fault, drama queen.
subtitles.english: This is all your fault, drama queen.

subtitles.original: You claim to love Marine, but you had no idea that she was hiding behind a mustache.
subtitles.english: You claim to love Marine, but you had no idea that she was hiding behind a mustache.

subtitles.original: Because of your idiocy... her soul is mine now!
subtitles.english: Because of your idiocy... her soul is mine now!

subtitles.original: Me? How was I supposed to know?
subtitles.english: Me? How was I supposed to know?

subtitles.original: She was never supposed to be on this quest in the first place!
subtitles.english: She was never supposed to be on this quest in the first place!

subtitles.original: Wait, if she's here, then that must mean the real Pirate Captain is dead.
subtitles.english: Wait, if she's here, then that must mean the real Pirate Captain is dead.

subtitles.original: And that's your domain, Miss Reaper.
subtitles.english: And that's your domain, Miss Reaper.

subtitles.original: If the Captain is gone, it means
subtitles.english: If the Captain is gone, it means

subtitles.original: you have had some responsibility in all of this.
subtitles.english: you have had some responsibility in all of this.

subtitles.original: You could have stopped all of this at any time.
subtitles.english: You could have stopped all of this at any time.

subtitles.original: 無罪！無罪！
subtitles.english: Innocent! Innocent!

subtitles.original: Oh, so you want to blame me for all of this? It wasn't me who killed the Captain.
subtitles.english: Oh, so you want to blame me for all of this? It wasn't me who killed the Captain.

subtitles.original: I only protected Marine after she begged for me to help hide her identity from you.
subtitles.english: I only protected Marine after she begged for me to help hide her identity from you.

subtitles.original: She just wanted to complete your stupid quest in honor of her lover.
subtitles.english: She just wanted to complete your stupid quest in honor of her lover.

subtitles.original: Yes, but you shouldn't have agreed to hide her.
subtitles.english: Yes, but you shouldn't have agreed to hide her.

subtitles.original: I would have known if you hadn't meddled,
subtitles.english: I would have known if you hadn't meddled,

subtitles.original: and I would have given her my favor without this quest.
subtitles.english: and I would have given her my favor without this quest.
My soul...?

subtitles.original: You're lucky she's here to keep me from hurting you.
subtitles.english: You're lucky she's here to keep me from hurting you.

subtitles.original: I'd like to see you try. Besides, this one wasn't me.
subtitles.english: I'd like to see you try. Besides, this one wasn't me.

subtitles.original: あの...
subtitles.english: Umm...

subtitles.original: Marine put bananas in his tea.
subtitles.english: Marine put bananas in his tea.

subtitles.original: Eh!?
subtitles.english: Eh!?

subtitles.original: Deathly allergic to bananas...
subtitles.english: Deathly allergic to bananas...

subtitles.original: So that's how it was...
subtitles.english: So that's how it was...
